EmailTemplate.name: Enterprise Blitz VDI.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: VDI performance assurance whitepaper, and setting up time
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=}},
I wanted to share a free whitepaper <http://go.vmturbo.com/wp-assuring-performance-in-vdi-deployments.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vdient> that explores the challenges of VDI roll-outs, and how a simple approach can help you increase VDI seats on your existing infrastructure by up to 30% (average our customers are seeing).
I’d also like to set up an informal discussion on these business challenges (be they VDI or otherwise), and whether or not VMTurbo can help you solve them.
Looking forward to your reply,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=}} {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=}} | {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=}} 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
